    7: def assert_offset_equal(offset, base, expected):
    8:     actual = offset + base
    9:     actual_swapped = base + offset
   10:     actual_apply = offset._apply(base)
   11:     try:
   12:         assert actual == expected
   13:         assert actual_swapped == expected
   14:         assert actual_apply == expected
   15:     except AssertionError as err:
   16:         raise AssertionError(
   17:             f"\nExpected: {expected}\nActual: {actual}\nFor Offset: {offset})"
   18:             f"\nAt Date: {base}"
   19:         ) from err
   20: 
   21: 
   22: def assert_is_on_offset(offset, date, expected):
   23:     actual = offset.is_on_offset(date)
   24:     assert actual == expected, (
   25:         f"\nExpected: {expected}\nActual: {actual}\nFor Offset: {offset})"
   26:         f"\nAt Date: {date}"
   27:     )
